segments.text: It may comfort you to know that many people attended his viewing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How did they hear ? No one called .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In times of loss , it is often hard to pick up the phone . But his whole family was here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: His mom and dad must be destroyed . He was their only son .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And he was so young , with so much life to look forward to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes ... thank you for understanding . We have to go now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This sheet tells the visiting hours and funeral time and location .
segments.speaker: S1
